title: can't launch league from launcher
body: I'm having trouble opening up a fresh install of league of legends. the launcher is overly laggy, and whenever I click the "launch" button, there's a short pause and then the launch noise, but then the greyed out launch button becomes orange again and nothing happens. please help.

replies.body: The most common cause of this is usually a security setting that's preventing the client from opening.  As a first step, I suggest making sure your permissions are set correctly through the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide.  Let me know if you still have issues, and we can go from there.
even running it as Administrator isn't fixing the issue
